title: en.wikipedia.org_wiki_Le_T%C3%A9l%C3%A9gramme
transformers_text: Le T l gram me French pronunciation l tele am is a French language daily newspaper from the Brittany region of France based in the commune of Morla ix It was founded in 1944 and still exists to this day although circulation has been declining since 2012 Le T l gram me was founded on 12 September 1944 by members of the French Resistance as the Germans retreated following D Day and the 6 June 1944 Normandy landings 1 It was seen as a replacement for La D p che de Brest which had been seen as collaborationist 2 The newspaper is distributed in the Finist re department the C tes d ' Armor department and elsewhere in Brittany 3
